name: Krazy Kourses
description:
Krazy Kourses is a mad house game filled with zany inventions and traps, some to help you and others to hinder, as you guide your unruly ball to the finish goal! Float on water, fly through the air, bounce over all terrain, just don't break your balls!

Your state of the art UltraVac3000 is the tool of choice for controlling objects over rough terrain, never leave home without one!

This game was completed by Banana Massacre Games during the GMTK Jam 2020.

  • Zen00
  • Kwisarts
  • Trevor Bagels
  • Julian
  • Wahoo

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse movement
  • Mouse left button
